description:
By completing all relevant sidequests you can acquire the following contents:
1. Yumo’s costume “Lola Costume”
2. Yumo’s accessory “Lola Headgear”
3. Yumo’s Special Skill "Support Lola"

※Sidequests may be temporarily interrupted as the game progresses.

This content includes the following items:
1. “Luminous Avenger iX 2” collaborative sidequest DLC “Visitors from Other World" x 3
2. Yumo’s costume “Lola Costume”
3. Yumo’s accessory “Lola Headgear”
4. Yumo’s Special Skill "Support Lola"
name: Luminous Avenger iX 2 - Visitors from Other World
